# src: LY 15.02; tr. CH
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_015-2a>¶
15.2在陳絕糧，¶
從者病，¶
莫能興。¶
子路慍見曰：¶	KR1g0009_008:1a:8:4:2,KR1h0004_015:2a:4:1:1,KR1h0006_008:1b:8:15:5,KR1h0007_015:2a:7:13:6,KR1h0007_015:2b:3:38:6,KR1h0015_007:1a:10:15:4,KR1h0020_004:1b:1:11:7,KR2a0001_400:1097a:24:1:1096,KR2c0021_086:35a:7:8:6,KR2c0021_086:38b:3:13:6,KR3a0069_001:16b:2:8:8

15.5子曰：¶

恭己正南面而已矣。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_015-6a>¶	KR1b0019_004:13b:5:15:1,KR1b0055_001:39a:5:12:433,KR1d0057_054:9a:3:10:0,KR1d0068_030:9b:8:14:31,KR1h0004_015:5a:4:1:4,KR1h0017_015:6b:1:16:33,KR1h0025_013:14b:4:15:4,KR1h0026_008:3b:1:16:11,KR1h0026_008:3b:7:19:12,KR1h0028_011:5b:1:16:20,KR1h0034_011:5a:6:16:20,KR1h0039_002:9a:4:6:58,KR1h0043_015:7b:7:16:18,KR2b0017_004:13a:3:19:47,KR3a0016_001:11b:6:29:42,KR3a0047_023:8a:8:3:3,KR3a0047_023:8b:1:17:3,KR3a0080_158:22a:2:16:167,KR3a0108_011:2a:2:3:10,KR3a0108_011:2a:3:17:10,KR3k0012_081:4b:3:16:5,KR3k0012_622:7b:4:16:5,KR3k0012_999:4b:3:16:6545,KR3k0012_999:7b:4:16:13110,KR3k0050_011:28b:1:7:5,KR3k0055_058:3a:5:2:2,KR4d0443_020:37b:7:20:17,KR4e0121_010:11b:1:16:17,KR4e0225_008:62b:7:16:90,KR5c0070_002:035a:9:7:23,KR5c0106_013:008a:2:5:4,KR5c0364_000:016a:10:2:1,KR5h0033_001:003b:4:17:4

# src: LY 15.06:01; tr. CH
15.6子張問行。¶
子曰：¶
「言忠信，¶
行篤敬，¶
雖蠻貊之邦，行矣。¶	KR1a0021_003:25a:8:2:0,KR1a0027_003:2a:6:2:0,KR1a0041_010:3a:6:6:0,KR1a0046_017:9a:2:12:108,KR1a0047_014:24a:7:17:0,KR1a0064_022:11b:6:10:1,KR1a0092_001:117b:1:4:15,KR1a0092_003:10b:2:10:1,KR1a0092_004:35b:1:6:8,KR1a0092_008:43a:2:6:1,KR1a0095_001:66a:6:20:3,KR1a0095_004:43a:6:7:1,KR1a0096_002:75a:1:12:1,KR1a0102_004:24b:1:2:0,KR1a0102_007:2a:7:16:0,KR1a0102_007:20a:1:17:0,KR1a0102_014:28a:7:6:0,KR1a0113_004:60a:6:3:12,KR1a0139_016:4a:4:10:25,KR1b0007_002:39b:8:14:1,KR1d0051_077:11a:8:11:5,KR1d0057_059:5a:3:10:1,KR1d0057_128:2b:7:18:0,KR1e0052_007:8a:8:20:1,KR1g0009_005:6a:7:1:2,KR1g0009_008:2b:7:15:2,KR1h0004_015:5a:9:1:5,KR1h0006_008:4a:1:13:8,KR1h0006_008:4a:8:30:8,KR1h0007_015:4a:3:13:10,KR1h0007_015:4b:1:32:10,KR1h0012_007:13b:5:1:36,KR1h0012_008:3b:5:13:12,KR1h0012_008:4a:1:3:13,KR1h0015_007:2a:6:24:4,KR1h0017_005:10a:3:16:33,KR1h0017_009:24b:8:9:80,KR1h0017_015:6b:4:13:34,KR1h0017_017:13a:9:9:34,KR1h0017_019:7b:2:4:34,KR1h0019_003:34b:11:13:159,KR1h0020_004:2a:6:13:13,KR1h0021_001:4a:4:13:14,KR1h0024_004:13b:1:33:7,KR1h0024_013:3b:2:6:4,KR1h0026_008:3b:10:13:13,KR1h0028_002:29a:7:2:36,KR1h0028_011:6a:11:9:24,KR1h0033_002:37b:11:19:149,KR1h0034_011:6a:3:9:24,KR1h0038_012:3b:12:9:24,KR1h0039_004:8a:6:4:22,KR1h0039_004:28a:3:13:105,KR1h0039_004:44b:8:17:177,KR1h0043_012:41b:8:5:88,KR1h0043_015:8b:7:9:22,KR1h0043_036:10b:1:32:4,KR2a0009_057:12b:1:14:7,KR2b0004_013:5a:6:8:4,KR2b0019_202:9b:8:3:2,KR2d0005_032:20b:2:6:1,KR2e0020_085:21a:2:16:10,KR2f0039_002:47a:5:18:2,KR2f0039_123:28a:4:11:18,KR2g0033_011:7b:5:19:2,KR2g0039_026:6a:2:12:4,KR2g0046_041:7a:4:20:1,KR2k0138_017:7b:3:18:11,KR2l0010_002:25b:7:4:24,KR2m0001_200:26b:3:18:4,KR2o0020_065:7b:5:20:37,KR3a0030_011:22b:3:11:2,KR3a0042_002:18b:6:6:4,KR3a0043_002:23a:3:16:4,KR3a0043_002:75b:3:6:5,KR3a0046_003:3a:2:33:10,KR3a0047_027:24b:6:2:3,KR3a0047_042:35a:1:20:18,KR3a0047_043:15b:8:5:16,KR3a0047_114:23a:5:4:2,KR3a0056_005:10b:8:11:2,KR3a0058_035:4a:6:13:39,KR3a0059_027:6b:2:13:2,KR3a0059_029:34b:5:13: 失言。¶
知者不失人，¶	KR1d0057_137:6b:4:10:0,KR1g0009_008:4a:5:2:2,KR1h0004_015:7a:16:1:8,KR1h0005_008:3b:2:12:0,KR1h0007_015:5b:4:2:10,KR1h0012_008:6a:1:4:16,KR1h0015_007:3a:4:13:4,KR1h0017_015:8b:9:2:45,KR1h0019_003:35b:9:2:163,KR1h0020_004:3a:4:2:17,KR1h0021_001:5a:6:2:18,KR1h0024_013:5a:7:15:4,KR1h0026_008:5a:7:2:17,KR1h0028_011:9b:1:3:33,KR1h0034_011:8a:7:3:33,KR1h0038_012:6a:7:3:33,KR1h0039_004:46a:7:21:190,KR1h0039_005:41b:1:17:124,KR1h0043_015:13a:2:3:31,KR1h0043_015:13a:4:30:32,KR1h0054_011:4b:1:15:18,KR3a0012_001:23b:7:5:11,KR3k0013_717:1a:5:3:2,KR4d0184_004:3b:3:1:2,KR4d0215_013:3b:2:20:3,KR4e0114_016:15b:1:3:13,KR6d0098_001:0705b:2:3:259

15.10子貢問為仁。¶

# src: LY 15.11; tr. CH
15.11顏淵問為邦。¶

15.13子曰：¶
「已矣乎！¶
吾未見好德如好色者也。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_015-14a>¶	KR1h0004_009:12a:56:1:21,KR1h0004_015:7a:44:1:13,KR1h0006_005:14a:10:3:20,KR1h0006_008:8b:4:5:13,KR1h0017_009:29b:1:3:103,KR1h0024_010:10a:2:1:4,KR1h0024_013:8b:7:2:4,KR1h0026_005:10b:6:3:37,KR1h0026_008:3a:7:13:10,KR1h0026_008:7b:11:6:27,KR1h0026_008:8a:1:9:28,KR1h0026_008:8a:2:14:28,KR1h0028_008:19b:4:3:60,KR1h0028_011:15a:3:6:51,KR1h0034_008:19b:8:3:60,KR1h0035_001:29a:2:20:180,KR1h0035_001:39b:5:1:247,KR1h0043_009:27a:5:3:61,KR2a0001_400:1076a:31:1:1075,KR2a0009_090:24b:5:31:6,KR2d0005_031:8b:2:7:1,KR2d0023_014:37b:4:4:29,KR2d0024_085:26a:6:10:2,KR2g0001_003:5b:4:3:1,KR3a0001_009:5b:4:16:0,KR3k0012_491:1a:10:18:4,KR3k0012_999:1a:10:18:11934,KR3k0013_770:4a:2:9:2,KR3k0013_789:3a:7:19:2,KR3k0045_007:28b:4:1:6,KR3k0054_020:8a:4:6:2,KR6o0107_015:0378c:27:1:29,KR6o0120_008:0677b:8:14:56,KR6p0061_001:0441c:6:10:93,KR6q0386_003:0481b:12:11:24,KR6q0386_012:0541a:24:2:29,KR6q0412_003:0174b:23:14:57

15.19子曰：¶

「其恕乎！¶

斯民也，¶

15.31子曰：¶

無益，¶

15.32子曰：¶

15.41子曰：¶
「辭
達而已矣。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_015-42a>¶	KR1a0136_005:36a:5:19:1,KR1b0048_008:25a:2:17:4,KR1c0007_001:16b:8:21:5,KR1d0030_014:14b:2:7:0,KR1d0049_021:39a:2:7:172,KR1d0087_181:14b:2:1:24,KR1e0015_009:12b:2:4:44,KR1e0052_006:8b:8:8:1,KR1e0114_043:35a:3:14:13,KR1g0009_008:15b:4:4:2,KR1g0009_008:15b:5:17:2,KR1h0004_015:7a:161:2:41,KR1h0006_008:17b:3:4:36,KR1h0007_015:16a:4:4:39,KR1h0012_008:21b:5:4:76,KR1h0012_008:21b:8:11:77,KR1h0015_007:8b:2:14:4,KR1h0017_015:40b:6:4:226,KR1h0019_003:45b:9:4:223,KR1h0020_004:10a:1:4:63,KR1h0021_001:16a:10:4:80,KR1h0024_013:16a:1:19:4,KR1h0026_008:18b:3:4:83,KR1h0026_008:18b:6:18:84,KR1h0028_011:28a:11:4:107,KR1h0028_016:12b:3:36:48,KR1h0031_023:11b:4:5:45,KR1h0031_023:11b:6:2:46,KR1h0034_011:29a:1:4:107,KR1h0034_011:29a:4:1:108,KR1h0038_012:18b:11:4:108,KR1h0039_004:45b:9:15:185,KR1h0043_015:44b:5:4:108,KR1h0043_015:44b:8:4:109,KR2b0007_123:10a:7:8:2,KR2m0009_233:8b:5:8:114,KR2m0015_237:24b:8:15:106,KR2m0037_033:5b:8:18:13,KR2n0011_214:3b:4:7:10,KR2o0015_046:16b:1:1:10,KR3a0011_004:3b:8:4:4,KR3a0014_002:7b:7:4:4,KR3a0025_002:18a:1:10:14,KR3a0029_012:3a:4:6:11,KR3a0047_009:15a:4:3:2,KR3a0047_045:33b:3:2:25,KR3a0047_045:33b:4:2:25,KR3a0078_003:11b:2:7:91,KR3a0078_056:50b:6:16:9,KR3a0094_024:6b:1:8:1,KR3a0094_025:6a:7:9:1,KR3a0107_001:39b:6:9:47,KR3a0108_003:28b:4:3:10,KR3a0108_024:39a:6:12:11,KR3a0110_051:77a:4:8:968,KR3a0110_067:24a:1:6:317,KR3j0060_007:1a:5:5:2,KR3j0060_007:1a:8:10:2,KR3j0066_000:114a:8:7:56,KR3j0070_019:16b:6:10:11,KR3j0182_032:10a:3:19:1,KR3k0038_008:15b:5:2:14,KR3k0038_118:10a:2:21:10,KR3k0046_045:18b:8:12:2,KR3k0055_089:31a:8:20:6,KR3k0055_165:35a:3:21:5,KR3k0055_201:2a:8:6:2,KR3k0056_225:39a:5:6:5,KR4c0036_001:21b:6:13:9,KR4d0026_002:9a:10:3:11,KR4d0040_041:3b:3:8:180,KR4d0040_060:3b:3:8:2,KR4d0047_000:5b:3:13:31,KR4d0076_075:18a:7:13:15,KR4d0076_075:22b:8:18:19,KR4d0139_007:14a:6:2:19,KR4d0179_030:7a:6:15:4,KR4d0179_030:15a:3:18:9,KR4d0180_002:20a:2:25:7,KR4d0198_026:40a:8:11:15,KR4d0226_008:9b:10:5:5629,KR4d0226_067:9 「階也。」¶

子曰：¶
「然；¶
固相師之道也。」	KR1d0030_004:20a:6:8:0,KR1g0009_008:16a:2:6:2,KR1h0004_015:7a:178:1:43,KR1h0005_008:10a:4:9:0,KR1h0006_008:17b:10:13:37,KR1h0006_008:18a:7:42:37,KR1h0007_015:16b:1:5:40,KR1h0007_015:16b:6:30:40,KR1h0012_008:22a:5:2:78,KR1h0015_007:8b:6:8:4,KR1h0017_015:41a:9:2:232,KR1h0019_003:46a:3:2:225,KR1h0020_004:10a:7:2:65,KR1h0021_001:16b:5:2:82,KR1h0024_013:16a:5:16:4,KR1h0024_013:16b:7:9:4,KR1h0026_008:18b:10:2:85,KR1h0028_011:29a:3:4:113,KR1h0034_011:29b:6:4:113,KR1h0038_012:19a:12:4:114,KR1h0039_003:27b:7:8:149,KR1h0043_015:45b:3:4:114,KR2g0001_004:15b:7:11:1,KR2g0023_009:8a:8:19:6,KR2g0024_065:6a:7:4:4,KR3a0039_004:3a:5:19:0,KR3a0059_032:35b:2:4:2,KR3a0059_032:36b:6:20:2,KR4d0215_001:2a:3:6:1
